sys_script.description: El campo venta final proyecto modifica el monto de la HCO
sys_script.name: SLX SC modifica monto HCO

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_4f100f1cdbe2d8d43f3bbe4f29961950
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hocsa_san_solicitud_de_cambio</collection><condition/><description>El campo venta final proyecto modifica el monto de la HCO</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_hocsa_san_solicitud_de_cambio">u_slx_venta_final_proyectoVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_slx_venta_final_proyecto" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SLX SC modifica monto HCO</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	//Gliderecord de ficha OS
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_hocsa_san_ficha_de proyecto');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id', current.u_slx_hco);
	gr.query();
	
	if(gr.next())
		{
			//se modifica el monto de la os por el monto SC
			gr.u_slx_notas='Cambio realizado al monto total venta, el monto anterior era: $'+gr.u_slx_monto_total_venta+'\n Cambio generado por la SC N째'+current.u_slx_sc;
			gr.u_slx_monto_total_venta=current.u_slx_venta_final_proyecto;
			gr.update();
			gs.addInfoMessage('Se ha modificado el monto de la OS N째 '+ gr.u_slx_numero_os);
		}
	
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bs</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 23:02:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4f100f1cdbe2d8d43f3bbe4f29961950</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX SC modifica monto HCO</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="san" source="x_hocsa_san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4f100f1cdbe2d8d43f3bbe4f29961950</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-11 14:29:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4f100f1cdbe2d8d43f3bbe4f29961950"/></record_update>
